original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 810: Pi4J – Stable and Boring on the Raspberry Pi
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett, Randal Schwartz, and Aaron Newcomb chat about Linux, the challenges with using system modules like the Raspberry Pi, challenges with funding development, and more!


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: - Raspberry Piのシステムモジュールを使う際の課題とは？
body: 今週のFLOSS Weeklyでは、LinuxやRaspberry Piの課題について討論。
titles: - Raspberry Piのシステムモジュールを使う際の課題とは？
- FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャストで語るLinuxの魅力
- 開発資金調達の難しさとその解決策
- YouTubeでのライブ録画を見逃すな！
- ゲストインタビュー企画への参加方法 안내
